name: Relevance
introduction: The BloomReach Experience Relevance Module allows marketers to customize the appearance of their channels based on the characteristics of individual visitors.
description: Please note that this component is a BloomReach Experience only component. Adding this component to the community version will convert your project to an Enterprise project and might result in unexpected and unsupported behaviour of the project if you do not have an Enterprise license. This product includes GeoLite2 data created by MaxMind, available from http://www.maxmind.com.
